accordion.No_shows_or_late_cancellations_may_incur: No-shows or late cancellations may incur a fee.
accordion.Return_the_car_on_time_to_avoid_late_fee: Return the car on time to avoid late fees.
accordion.Cleanliness_fee_may_apply_if_excessively: A cleanliness fee may apply if the car is returned excessively dirty.
accordion.In_case_of_accident_contact_company: In case of an accident, contact the rental company immediately.
accordion.Roadside_assistance_available_24_7: Roadside assistance is available 24/7 for mechanical issues.
accordion.Free_cancellation_up_to_24_hours_before_: Free cancellation up to 24 hours before pickup.
accordion.No_unauthorized_drivers_only_listed_rent: No unauthorized drivers; only listed renters are insured.
accordion.No_off-road_driving_racing_or_towing_unl: No off-road driving, racing, or towing unless approved.
accordion.Payment_methods_Credit_debit_cards_cash_: Payment methods: Credit/debit cards, cash (prepaid cards not accepted).
accordion.A_security_deposit_is_required_at_pickup: A security deposit is required at pickup.
accordion.Reservations_can_be_made_online_by_phone: Reservations can be made online, by phone, or in person.
accordion.Tourist_and_International_renters_must_p: Tourist and International renters must present a passport.
accordion.A_valid_driver's_license_is_required_at_: A valid driver's license is required at pickup.
accordion.renters_must_be_at_least_18_years_old_so: Renters must be at least 18 years old (some vehicles may require 25+). A valid driver's license and credit card in the renter's name are required.

bookingModal.location_accuracy_note: You can choose pickup and dropoff locations accurately.
bookingModal.airports_maritime_train_stations_availab: Airports, maritime ports, and train stations are available.
bookingModal.select_choice_for_driver: Select your choice for a driver
